verses.text: At that \w time|strong="H6256"\w* \w Merodach-baladan|strong="H4757"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Baladan|strong="H1081"\w*, \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w*, \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w letters|strong="H5612"\w* and a \w present|strong="H4503"\w* to \w Hezekiah|strong="H2396"\w*: for he had \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* that he had been \w sick|strong="H2470"\w*, and was \w recovered|strong="H2388"\w*.

And \w Hezekiah|strong="H2396"\w* was \w glad|strong="H8055"\w* of them, and \w shewed|strong="H7200"\w* them the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of his precious \w things|strong="H5238"\w*, the \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*, and the \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*, and the \w spices|strong="H1314"\w*, and the \w precious|strong="H2896"\w* \w ointment|strong="H8081"\w*, and all the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of his \w armour|strong="H3627"\w*, and all that was \w found|strong="H4672"\w* in his \w treasures|strong="H0214"\w*: there was \w nothing|strong="H1697"\w* in his \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, nor in all his \w dominion|strong="H4475"\w*, that \w Hezekiah|strong="H2396"\w* \w shewed|strong="H7200"\w* them not.\f + \fr 39.2 \ft precious things: or, spicery\f*\f + \fr 39.2 \ft armour: or, jewels: Heb. vessels, or, instruments\f*

Â¶ Then \w came|strong="H0935"\w* \w Isaiah|strong="H3470"\w* the \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* unto \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w Hezekiah|strong="H2396"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, What \w said|strong="H0559"\w* these \w men|strong="H0582"\w*? and from \w whence|strong="H0370"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* they unto thee? And \w Hezekiah|strong="H2396"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, They are \w come|strong="H0935"\w* from a \w far|strong="H7350"\w* \w country|strong="H0776"\w* unto me, \add even\add* from \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w*.

Then \w said|strong="H0559"\w* he, What have they \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* in thine \w house|strong="H1004"\w*? And \w Hezekiah|strong="H2396"\w* \w answered|strong="H0559"\w*, All that \add is\add* in mine \w house|strong="H1004"\w* have they \w seen|strong="H7200"\w*: there is \w nothing|strong="H1697"\w* among my \w treasures|strong="H0214"\w* that I have not \w shewed|strong="H7200"\w* them.

Then \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w Isaiah|strong="H3470"\w* to \w Hezekiah|strong="H2396"\w*, \w Hear|strong="H8085"\w* the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*:

Behold, the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w*, that all that \add is\add* in thine \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, and \add that\add* which thy \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* have laid up in \w store|strong="H0686"\w* until this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, shall be \w carried|strong="H5375"\w* to \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w*: \w nothing|strong="H1697"\w* shall be \w left|strong="H3498"\w*, \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

And of thy \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* that shall \w issue|strong="H3318"\w* from thee, which thou shalt \w beget|strong="H3205"\w*, shall they take \w away|strong="H3947"\w*; and they shall be \w eunuchs|strong="H5631"\w* in the \w palace|strong="H1964"\w* of the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w*.

Then \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w Hezekiah|strong="H2396"\w* to \w Isaiah|strong="H3470"\w*, \w Good|strong="H2896"\w* \add is\add* the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* which thou hast \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w*. He \w said|strong="H0559"\w* moreover, For there shall be \w peace|strong="H7965"\w* and \w truth|strong="H0571"\w* in my \w days|strong="H3117"\w*.
